articles.author: Robert Lea
articles.title: Watch Europe's Jupiter-bound JUICE spacecraft speed away from Earth in these photos by amateur astronomers - Space.com
articles.description: The probe will take eight years to reach the largest planet of the solar system but will return to Earth three times to get some help to get there.
articles.content: Amateur and professional astronomers alike came together on Friday, April 13 to capture the Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (JUICE) spacecraft as it headed away from Earth on its eight-year trip to Jupite… [+3623 chars]
